event: penetrating stab wound to the anterior left second intercostal space
2 cm medial to the mid-clavicular line
chronic septic hardware of the right lower limb
not formally assessed by an orthopaedic service
Focused Assessment with Sonography for Trauma scan
injury tract extended to medial superior vena cava
high index of suspicion for SVC injury
large dense lesion beneath pulmonary valve
heart arrested with cold blood cardioplegia
large clot found in medial wall of RVOT
RVOT repaired with continuous 3/0 prolene sutures
plane between main pulmonary artery and ascending aorta dissected
contralateral side of ascending aorta defect
small point injury to base of SVC
no intracardiac shunt at early follow#8211;up
